name: Cosmic Star Heroine
summary: 3 exotic planets to explore. Aliens. Robots. Magic. Forbidden technology. Ruined Worlds. Ghosts. Long-lost secrets. Conspiracies. A galactic threat. And one brave heroine to make things right. Cosmic Star Heroine is an exciting new RPG from the creators of Cthulhu Saves the World.
info:
• 中文名: 宇宙女英雄
  • 平台: Windows PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2017/4/11
  • 售价: $14.99

  • 开发商: Zeboyd Games
